phrs.translation: 回响, 充满声音, 鸣响, 回荡
瑞声达, 丹麦瑞声达, 助听器, 厂商瑞声达

sentences.sentence: This was Rapunzel, who in her solitude passed her time in letting her sweet voice resound.
sentences.translation: 这就是莴苣姑娘，她在孤独中让自己甜美的声音回响，以此来消磨时光。

sentences.sentence: His resounding voice continued to resound in my ears long after he was out of sight.
sentences.translation: 他人走远了，但他响亮的声音仍在我耳际回荡。
号角声和锣鼓声回荡山谷。
